name: I Think In A Minute Or So I Will Explode
name_original: I Think In A Minute Or So I Will Explode
description:
Requires Flash.

I THINK IN A MINUTE OR SO I WILL EXPLODE is a Game about Science, Heroes, and the Future.
Become a true NATION HERO and volunteer to take the ULTRAMANS ELIXIR!
Climb to GREATEST HEIGHTS than any other nation AGAINYMORE will!
BE the HERO GLORIOUS LEADER wants YOU to BE!
TYPE in ALL CAPS and IMPRESS PEOPLE with your PLATFORMING PROWESS!
Can you DISCOVER all TWENTY research MILESTONES and INGENUITIZE the FUTURE?

Arrows or WASD to move.
X, L, or SPACE to JUMP and back out.
C or K to SWITCH POLARITY and to select.
M to MUTE/UNMUTE.
ENTER to BLOW your own HEAD off.

Game/Art by Hangedman http://hangedmandesign.com
Sound/Music by Jack Menhorn http://jackmenhorn.com

Looking back, three years later, the themes in this game are a bit weird.
Don't know if I'm super happy with joking about miserable cultural control, but I'm still proud of my game.
I hope you enjoy it.

BTW, here's a hint for actually reading this:
COMPLACENT requires you to find a happy place.
